rules.title: How to Play
rules.overview: In a secluded village, hidden werewolves hunt at night. By day, villagers must find and execute them. Each role has a unique ability.

phase.captain: Elect a captain. Their vote counts double and breaks ties.
phase.night: At night, special roles wake in order: Wolves choose a victim, Seer learns a role, Witch may heal or poison, Protector guards someone.
phase.day: At dawn, the village votes to execute a suspect. Eliminate all wolves to win.
phase.hunter: If the Hunter is killed, they may take one victim with their last breath.

role.wolf: Each night, wolves wake together and choose one victim. Wolves win if they equal or outnumber villagers.
role.villager: No special power. Use your wits and votes to find the wolves.
role.seer: Each night, choose a player to learn their true role.
role.witch: One heal and one poison. You are told the wolves' victim and may save or poison.
role.hunter: If you die, you immediately choose one player to kill.
role.cupid: Night one only: choose two lovers. If one dies, the other dies. Lovers win if last two alive.
role.thief: Night one only: choose one of two role cards to become.
role.protector: Each night, protect a player. Wolves cannot kill them.
role.elder: Survives first wolf attack. If executed, village loses voting power.
role.idiot: If executed, you survive but are revealed and can never vote again.
role.littleGirl: May peek at the wolves when they wake.

win.wolves: Wolves win when they equal or outnumber villagers.
win.villagers: Villagers win when all wolves are dead.
win.lovers: If the last two alive are lovers, they win together.
